2012096660935975045.norm_text: Tested tempo gradients in Banger's creative posting flow today. They didn't quite land the emotional shift I wanted. Sticking with this path, refining the transition curves tomorrow.

2012613525819085091.norm_text: Mapped the product's full code flow end-to-end. It highlighted a few areas I hadn't seen in a while. Sticking with this deep dive to understand every path.

manual_1768746504279.norm_text: Began refining the posting tool today. Uncovered a few tricky parts that need careful attention. This will be a longer effort than expected. Sticking with it.

community_1768822358129.norm_text: Removed some inefficient processing that caused slow response times on requests. It was definitely too slow. Aiming to ship the fix by end of day.

community_1768824168757.norm_text: Fixed the slow response time issue. I'm testing it now to see if it works at all. Will push it live once confirmed.

community_1768826736322.norm_text: Reduced response time from 41110 milliseconds to 13665.7. That's a solid improvement for me. Now testing how stable it runs.

community_1768830719201.norm_text: Fixed the response time issue. It dropped response time by 67.24%. This clears the path forward for more building.
